Author: hollowberry_
Text: <3 there there :( I'm so sorry you are hurting. I've been there too. You deserve self-compassion and kindness. Nobody can be perfect in all realms all the time... even though it's what we're desperate for. Your body is so strong and wants you to survive... It's holding on because you can get to a better place. I hope things change for you soon so you can bring self-care into your life more. Life is so hard, and there are so many burdens. I wish you some peace. <3
